TopicTitle: How Much Time Have You Spent Playing KSP?

Articles.Content:
Steam says 463 hours.

All of them before I discovered OpenGL mode and started modding my 0.25 install properly.

I'm gunning for 1000 at least by now

- - - Updated - - -

Currently I have 463 hours played.

SNAP!
1350 hours on steam. And there is no end to it.
768 hours so far... must... get... MORE!!!

I have the GoG version so I have no idea.

I don't think I want to know.

Wouldn't surprise me if it was over 2000 hours.

• Steam has listed 2,300 hours (a little over that).
  • I also play 1.3 outside of Steam, and that averages about 10 hours a week; so there's another 1,000 hours or so. Been doing this for a while)
  • I also mod for the game, and in testing the mod, I do some poking around for another 5 hours a week.   (Been doing this for a year)

So, probably somewhere in the neighborhood of around 5,000 hours.

I've got 1563 hours logged in Steam, but I stopped using that to launch the game about 3 years ago (bought it 4 years ago). I don't play the game as much as I did in the 1st year, but I'd guess I've got around 3000 hours in the game by now.

I know others have played longer than that, but it's kind of crazy that I've probably played for the equivelent of 8 hours per day, 5 days a week, for 18 months.

Edited November 6, 2018 by purpleivan
I don't know, I have the direct download.

There's been times (when I wasn't working) when I was putting in entire days, from morning till late late night, for days on end. Then when I wasn't doing all day sessions, I was still playing every day and I don't think you can play KSP meaningfully with anything less than a 3 hour stint. Been playing since 2012 (although sadly much less in the last couple years)...I'm sure I'm over the 5k hour mark by now.  Never play on steam so I (thankfully) don't actually know, or I might be rather concerned! 
edit: That's not considering the time I put into KerbalX or mods.

Edited November 6, 2018 by katateochi
I've probably played KSP for about 70 hours, give or take
By my very rough estimate, I've been playing around 400-450 hours since February 2017.

I didn't have the game on Steam for years, and for the years since I got it on Steam as well, I've played the actual Steam version for 8 hours. About half of that was beta testing, and the other half was testing my missions.

I would guess I've played at least 2000 hours all told, but that could easily be off by 1000 in the positive direction, or ... well I don't think much in the negative direction if any chance at all. No, I think 2000 is a lowball estimate.

1 hour ago, 5thHorseman said:

I didn't have the game on Steam for years, and for the years since I got it on Steam as well, I've played the actual Steam version for 8 hours. About half of that was beta testing, and the other half was testing my missions.

I would guess I've played at least 2000 hours all told, but that could easily be off by 1000 in the positive direction, or ... well I don't think much in the negative direction if any chance at all. No, I think 2000 is a lowball estimate.

You could say: That's alotta hours!
1048 from here
407, but that is bound to change......

Coming up on 1000. I've been playing for 4 years. 

I don't know if it's a good or bad thing.
Currently at 1689 Steam hours and countless hours playing RSS/RP0 on builds outside of Steam. There are people here who have waaaaay above what I have. Honestly, Im barely more than a rookie.

1750hrs on Steam,

older RO install off of Steam that I have another 400hrs in (estimate).

To paraphrase Imelda Marcos, "I get so tired of 1,000 hours here, 1,000 hours there; it's just so petty".
(Approximateley 3,700 hours)

tfw your steam account says 11 hours but its more likely to be 11 days...

I stopped using steam ages ago so that i can boost load up times on my old laptop

How much time?   Ooooohhh LOTS!  Not as much time as many here, but at a guess 2 to 3 thousand hours

Been playing since v18.3 (5 1/2 years iirc)  less intensely nowadays, but still play regularly.

Edited November 23, 2018 by pandaman
~250 hours. I only just now got a Min landing.

95% of the time, I launch it through the .exe instead if steam. So the steamclock might not be so accurate. It says 500+ hours. But my own rough estimate would count it at 3000 to 3400+ hours since I got it in dec 2016.

 

Last game I sunk so much time in, Minecraft. Sandbox games are just endless fun

Edited November 24, 2018 by GrandProtectorDark
I don't know, nor do I want to.
I have 738 hours I landed on every planet and moons

On Steam I have almost 1000 hours logged. But, since I start directly from the executableto save resources on my quasi-potato, I have no idea of the real time spent...

Although I have so many hours, I've never gone very far from KSOI (only a fly-by of Eve and Duna), due to littlw free time and the habit of restarting career with every new version...
